rules_text:
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Crystallize. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Treasure.)[/i]
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]Its screech is the sound of hysteria.[/i]
